<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Spirit Veil](/Spells.aspx?ID=788)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 237 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Psychopomp](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=13)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You draw an occluding veil of spirits around yourself, blocking yourself especially well from [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) eyes. You become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) to all creatures, and you are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from undead creatures regardless of what precise senses they have; this grants the effects of [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), but against all the undead creature's precise senses. If you physically interact with an undead creature or use a hostile action, the spell ends.

---
**Heightened (+1)** You can target one additional willing creature within 30 feet. The spell ends if any target physically interacts with an undead creature or uses a hostile action
name: Spirit Veil
